TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RegistryKeyPermissionCheck extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定開啟登錄機碼並且存取其名稱/值組時，是否執行安全性檢查。

span.span: Specifies whether security checks are performed when opening registry keys and accessing their name/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式儲存或擷取子機碼的一組大量的登錄設定時，會執行許多重複的安全性檢查。When an application saves or retrieves a large number of registry settings from a set of subkeys, numerous redundant security checks are performed. 此列舉會指定在索引鍵的安全性檢查要省略。This enumeration specifies when security checks on a key are to be omitted. 下表顯示當執行安全性檢查，根據父索引鍵和目前的索引鍵已開啟的方式。The following table shows when security checks are performed, based on the way the parent key and the current key are opened. |使用開啟的父索引鍵Parent key opened with|使用開啟的目前索引鍵Current key opened with|結果Result| |----------------------------|-----------------------------|------------| |預設Default|預設Default|存取目前的機碼中的任何值時，或嘗試存取的子機碼時，會執行安全性檢查。A security check is performed when accessing any value in the current key, or when attempting to access a subkey. 這是.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中的行為。This is the behavior in the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1.| |預設Default|ReadSubTreeReadSubTree|嘗試開啟目前的索引鍵時，會執行安全性檢查。A security check is performed when trying to open the current key.| |預設Default|ReadWriteSubTreeReadWriteSubTree|嘗試開啟目前的索引鍵時，會執行安全性檢查。A security check is performed when trying to open the current key.| |ReadSubTreeReadSubTree|預設值或 ReadSubTreeDefault or ReadSubTree|開啟目前的索引鍵或其值時，會不執行任何安全性檢查。No security checks are performed when opening the current key or its values.| |ReadSubTreeReadSubTree|ReadWriteSubTreeReadWriteSubTree|嘗試開啟目前的索引鍵時，會執行安全性檢查。A security check is performed when trying to open the current key.| |ReadWriteSubTreeReadWriteSubTree|任何Any|開啟目前的索引鍵或其值時，會不執行任何安全性檢查。No security checks are performed when opening the current key or its values.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立一個包含 100 的索引鍵/值組的子機碼，並將它關閉。The following code example creates a subkey containing 100 key/value pairs and closes it. 此範例會開啟，預設值的子機碼，並記錄讀取所有的值所花費的時間。The example opens the subkey with Default and records the time it takes to read all the values. 然後此範例與 ReadSubTree 開啟子機碼，並記錄讀取所有的值所花費的時間。Then the example opens the subkey with ReadSubTree and records the time it takes to read all the values. 最後，範例會計算，並顯示改進百分比。Finally, the example computes and displays the percentage improvement. [!code-csharp[RegistryKey.OpenSubKey_PermCheck#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RegistryKey.OpenSubKey_PermCheck/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RegistryKey.OpenSubKey_PermCheck#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RegistryKey.OpenSubKey_PermCheck/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck Default = int32(0)

summary.span: 此登錄機碼繼承其父系的模式。

span.span: The registry key inherits the mode of its parent.

summary.span: 在嘗試存取子機碼或值的時候，執行安全性檢查，除非其父系是以 或 模式開啟。

span.span: Security checks are performed when trying to access subkeys or values, unless the parent was opened with or mode.

summary.span: 存取子機碼或值的時候，不執行安全性檢查。

span.span: Security checks are not performed when accessing subkeys or values.

summary.span: 在嘗試開啟目前機碼的時候，執行安全性檢查，除非其父系是以 或 開啟。

span.span: A security check is performed when trying to open the current key, unless the parent was opened with or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKeyPermissionCheck ReadWriteSubTree = int32(2)

summary.span: 存取子機碼或值的時候，不執行安全性檢查。

span.span: Security checks are not performed when accessing subkeys or values.

summary.span: 在嘗試開啟目前機碼的時候，執行安全性檢查，除非其父系是以 開啟。

span.span: A security check is performed when trying to open the current key, unless the parent was opened with .
